title: Weekly Digest (2 February, 2020 - 9 February, 2020)
body:
Here's the **Weekly Digest** for [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react):

 - - - 
# ISSUES
Last week 43 issues were created.
Of these, 11 issues have been closed and 32 issues are still open.
## OPEN ISSUES
:green_heart: #10005 [Show only 1 line of ens name](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10005), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10004 [Ens name of other users overwritten when they recover](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10004), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #10003 [Chat view is broken its not possible to scroll messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10003), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #10002 [Can't login to account `sql: no rows in result set` ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10002), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:green_heart: #10000 [Do not allow to register ens name from reserved names list](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/10000), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9996 [Clean up after recent tx history changes:](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9996), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9995 [[WIP] offload chat messages](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9995), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:green_heart: #9994 [re-enable site updates on nightly builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9994), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:green_heart: #9993 [[#9789] Add a loading indicator and button to username input of start…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9993), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9992 [QR code won't close from wallet screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9992), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9991 [Show ens names in transactions history](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9991), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9990 [Option to exclude/include account from total value](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9990), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9989 [Add optional mnemonic salt (password) support as TREZOR plausible deniability](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9989), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #9988 [Support 3box.io profiles to status users](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9988), by [3esmit](https://github.com/3esmit)
:green_heart: #9987 [Improve watching to new blocks (recent transfers state)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9987), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9986 [Allow to disable fetching of tx history on mobile network](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9986), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9985 [es_419 (Latin American Spanish) doesn't work on Android](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9985), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #9984 [Allow to scan QR code with an address which doesn't conform to eip55](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9984), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9983 [Short way to paste address on sending transaction](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9983), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9982 [Suggestions for mnemonic code](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9982), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:green_heart: #9981 [Sliding keyboard on suggested "iCloud Password" (autofill)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9981), by [simonricoo](https://github.com/simonricoo)
:green_heart: #9977 [Can't leave signing screen in case of losing internet connection](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9977), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9976 [Show pending transactions ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9976), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9974 [Change wallet 'send' button to 'next'](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9974), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9973 [Update Arabic, Spanish(LatAm), Italian, Korean and Chinese](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9973), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:green_heart: #9971 [[#9886] App shows 'buy' for stickerpack user owns when pressing on st…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9971), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:green_heart: #9970 [disable biometric auth when device can't save password (rooted)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9970), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:green_heart: #9969 [Update the keycard indicator for multiaccounts screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9969), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:green_heart: #9968 [Fixed cryptokitties loading/ordering](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9968), by [krzyzowiec](https://github.com/krzyzowiec)
:green_heart: #9966 [Upload profile picture with ENS ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9966), by [rachelhamlin](https://github.com/rachelhamlin)
:green_heart: #9965 [Pending stickers status maintains after app restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9965), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:green_heart: #9962 [Update prices in fiat more frequently ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9962), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## CLOSED ISSUES
:heart: #10001 [[#9975] Do not throw exception on invalid ens recipient](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10001), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #9999 [[#9975] Trim recipient address before validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9999), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:heart: #9998 [[#9961] Update glossary view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9998), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9997 [Check for empty public key](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9997), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9980 [Fix tests and disable non-relevant](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9980), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:heart: #9979 [update-status-go: don't accept SHA1s, accept PR numbers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9979), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:heart: #9978 [fix status-go version](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9978), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:heart: #9975 ["Invalid address: <no value>" error when address has whitespaces at the end](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9975), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:heart: #9972 [update prices for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9972), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9967 [load more ui fix](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9967), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:heart: #9964 [remove event duplication](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9964), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
## LIKED ISSUE
:+1: #9962 [Update prices in fiat more frequently ](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues/9962), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
It received :+1: x1, :smile: x0, :tada: x0 and :heart: x0.
## NOISY ISSUE
:speaker: #9965 [Pending stickers status maintains after app restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9965), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
It received 7 comments.

 - - - 
# PULL REQUESTS
Last week, 37 pull requests were created, updated or merged.
## UPDATED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 22 pull requests were updated.
:yellow_heart: #9996 [Clean up after recent tx history changes:](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9996), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)

:yellow_heart: #9994 [re-enable site updates on nightly builds](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9994), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:yellow_heart: #9993 [[#9789] Add a loading indicator and button to username input of start…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9993), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9973 [Update Arabic, Spanish(LatAm), Italian, Korean and Chinese](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9973), by [jinhojang6](https://github.com/jinhojang6)
:yellow_heart: #9971 [[#9886] App shows 'buy' for stickerpack user owns when pressing on st…](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9971), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:yellow_heart: #9970 [disable biometric auth when device can't save password (rooted)](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9970), by [yenda](https://github.com/yenda)
:yellow_heart: #9968 [Fixed cryptokitties loading/ordering](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9968), by [krzyzowiec](https://github.com/krzyzowiec)
:yellow_heart: #9965 [Pending stickers status maintains after app restart](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9965), by [vkjr](https://github.com/vkjr)
:yellow_heart: #9949 [Add ENV option to enable waku-mode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9949), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:yellow_heart: #9945 [WIP Rework and update react-navigation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9945), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9941 [improvement on snackbar by considering login time](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9941), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9940 [Pass extra argument to handle multiaccounts on logout](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9940), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9932 [[WIP] Remove unused translatins](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9932), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:yellow_heart: #9931 [Allow 2 lines for user name on intro screen](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9931), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9917 [componentizied input-search and search in set currency and token management](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9917), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9915 [WIP Make bottom sheet dynamical](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9915), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9898 [add watch only address using qrcode](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9898), by [tbenr](https://github.com/tbenr)
:yellow_heart: #9882 [Fix failed faceid clears auth settings](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9882), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9868 [Move chat dialogs to bottom sheet](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9868), by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:yellow_heart: #9802 [Test status-go update with shhext adjusted to waku](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9802), by [adambabik](https://github.com/adambabik)
:yellow_heart: #9788 [[#9748] eip681 parsing uri with whitespaces](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9788), by [ghmulti](https://github.com/ghmulti)
## MERGED PULL REQUEST
Last week, 15 pull requests were merged.
:purple_heart: #10001 [[#9975] Do not throw exception on invalid ens recipient](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/10001), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #9999 [[#9975] Trim recipient address before validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9999), by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:purple_heart: #9998 [[#9961] Update glossary view](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9998), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:purple_heart: #9997 [Check for empty public key](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9997), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9980 [Fix tests and disable non-relevant](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9980), by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:purple_heart: #9979 [update-status-go: don't accept SHA1s, accept PR numbers](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9979), by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:purple_heart: #9978 [fix status-go version](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9978), by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:purple_heart: #9972 [update prices for v1](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9972), by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

:purple_heart: #9952 [fixes ENS to new registry](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/pull/9952), by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)

 - - - 
# COMMITS
Last week there were 16 commits.
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9975] Do not throw exception on invalid ens recipient](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/39ea685adc3493c8943a86fb47e314601cbc0000) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9975] Trim recipient address before validation](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/8a612a38078ceed9f10491ffcf2ba492c7af5b32) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Check for empty public key  We check that ENS does not return an empty public key. In addition to that validation is done on status-go in order to avoid saving the chat.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/3d4ee8fe6a5f19b930ed8ac433792246a9c74a00) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9961] Update glossary view  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/06025ce26f11f7f847a0ae61c3772c6935818c31) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fixes ENS to new registry for verification  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/25fd297573b504d98925823880a1f9394654226b) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [uses new ENS registry. see: GHSA-8f9f-pc5v-9r5h](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/7c5decbbfc48dc739743fab99f09528e8b55e7f5) by [decanus](https://github.com/decanus)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Fix tests and disable non-relevant  Signed-off-by: Serhy <sergii@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/dcfac1c4e24b6cecd20bea17689ab575228c77a7) by [Serhy](https://github.com/Serhy)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update-status-go: don't accept SHA1s, accept PR numbers  There was some confusion when given ref/tag did not exist. Script would just use the value as commit SHA1 even if it was not one.  Signed-off-by: Jakub Sokołowski <jakub@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/f9c15be1d41059f68fc597d7f3ee7be6dae5e0e3) by [jakubgs](https://github.com/jakubgs)
:hammer_and_wrench: [fix status-go version  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/27a001b0f000517609b9b317f15a4c37b356656f) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Resolve ENS names in the background  This commits resolves ENS names in the background, implementing retries and exponential backoff. All is handled in the background in status-go.  Signed-off-by: Andrea Maria Piana <andrea.maria.piana@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/b1ec41813323d45d40919d0fe58a531094a7ee4a) by [cammellos](https://github.com/cammellos)
:hammer_and_wrench: [update prices for v1  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/76f9703afec989774a6430116dda4788ae94cffe) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [Update your keys screen  Fixes #9782  Change theme of new key action  Update translations  Fix e2e tests  Signed-off-by: Gheorghe Pinzaru <feross95@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6ad84f4232e37f5234dd5e4a44886bb06a12fb37) by [Ferossgp](https://github.com/Ferossgp)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9942] Upgradable paths in configs  Storing absolute path for different configs breaks compatibility on iOS as app's dir is changed after upgrade. The solution is to store relative paths and to concatenate it with `backend.rootDataDir`. The only exception is `LogFile` as it is stored outside `backend.rootDataDir` on Android. `LogDir` config was added to allow adding of custom dir for log file. Configs concerned: `DataDir` `LogDir` `LogFile` `KeystoreDir` `BackupDisabledDataDir`](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/ef49699222ca13a9f01e0dfc87f3319fa494f94b) by [rasom](https://github.com/rasom)
:hammer_and_wrench: [load more ui fix  Signed-off-by: Andrey Shovkoplyas <motor4ik@gmail.com>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/e0bafb842eefcbc53b618989653fd2427e0270ce) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [remove event duplication  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/6e9292c1e12568a9ae0ee348b3b564eb94732a66) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)
:hammer_and_wrench: [[#9954] Add 'view profile' to message long tap  Signed-off-by: yenda <eric@status.im>](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/commit/c1245d7b1dcb843eee8abff7e57a4ffd1478b3bd) by [flexsurfer](https://github.com/flexsurfer)

 - - -

# RELEASES
Last week there were no releases.

 - - - 

That's all for last week, please <kbd>:eyes: **Watch**</kbd> and <kbd>:star: **Star**</kbd> the repository [*status-im/status-react*](https://github.com/status-im/status-react) to receive next weekly updates. :smiley:

*You can also [view all Weekly Digests by clicking here](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/issues?q=is:open+is:issue+label:weekly-digest).*
